claim: Among superheroes whose full name starts with 'John', the most common country of origin is the United Kingdom.
extra_info: have John as their first name refers to full_name LIKE 'John%';
reasoning: The claim references 'country of origin' and 'United Kingdom', but the database has no country-related column or table. None of the tables (superhero, publisher, race, gender, alignment, colour, attribute, hero_attribute, superpower, hero_power) contain country information. This is an out-of-schema claim that cannot be verified.

content.text: I'll verify this claim step by step. Let me start by exploring the database schema.

input.description: List all tables in the superhero database

content.content:

attribute       gender          hero_power      race            superpower

tool_use_result.stdout:
alignment       colour          hero_attribute  publisher       superhero     
attribute       gender          hero_power      race            superpower

content.content:
CREATE TABLE superhero
(
    id             INTEGER not null
            primary key,
    superhero_name TEXT default NULL,
    full_name      TEXT default NULL,
    gender_id      INTEGER          default NULL,
    eye_colour_id  INTEGER          default NULL,
    hair_colour_id INTEGER          default NULL,
    skin_colour_id INTEGER          default NULL,
    race_id        INTEGER          default NULL,
    publisher_id   INTEGER          default NULL,
    alignment_id   INTEGER          default NULL,
    height_cm      INTEGER          default NULL,
    weight_kg      INTEGER          default NULL,
    foreign key (alignment_id) references alignment(id),
    foreign key (eye_colour_id) references colour(id),
    foreign key (gender_id) references gender(id),
    foreign key (hair_colour_id) references colour(id),
    foreign key (publisher_id) references publisher(id),
    foreign key (race_id) references race(id),
    foreign key (skin_colour_id) references colour(id)
);

content.text:
None of the tables in this database contain any "country of origin" information. The database has information about superhero names, genders, eye/hair/skin colors, races, publishers, alignments, heights, weights, attributes, and powers — but **no country data whatsoever**.

The claim references "country of origin" and "United Kingdom," which are concepts that are entirely absent from the database schema. This is an **out-of-schema** situation.
